pages.title: Foils
pages.text: When obtained, cards may be foiled. Foiled cards are given a shiny glint. Obtaining foiled cards counts towards set completion in the same way regular cards do.

pages.title: Foils
pages.text: Each individual card may be graded. Graded cards may be graded F, C, B, A, or S. Graded cards counts towards set completion in the same way regular cards do.

pages.title: Grading Sleeves
pages.text: To grade a card, place a Grading Sleeve in one hand, and a card to be graded in your off-hand (or vice-verca). Grading sleeves are consumed on use.

pages.title: Golden Grading Sleeves
pages.text: A Golden Grading Sleeve may be crafted from normal ones. These sleeves give slightly better odds for a higher grade.
